page.title: 09GAMES 1
page.content: {Games Children play at Whitewater {School. In Class 3{"Hey Presto"}is the most popular with the girls and{"Football"} with the boys. How to play{"Hey Presto." To play{"hey Presto,"}you mainly have to be able to do a hand stand. Take for instance{"Banana Split",}you go into the normal hand stand position and then you open your legs. The person who is "it" then chooses the person who was the best and then that person becomes "it." There are lots of other games like { {"Stuck in the mud"}and{"Hop-scotch."} When I go home I play games,such as { {"catch"}with my brother but he is not a very fast runner. If I don't play a game I go inside and read or play my flute.
